txt.en: Aid the Bounders with a donation!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will consume fifty Bounder's Tokens.</rgb>

'[placeholder], do you have Bounder's Tokens to donate?  A small amount will help us a lot.  \n\n'Each Bounder's Token you donate will aid in our endeavour.  If we collect enough, you and your fellows will be offered great rewards!'
'Please return when you have enough Bounder's Tokens.  We only accept one donation size.  Thank you so much for helping!'
The Bounder is grateful for your donation
Speak to the Bounder to donate one Bounder's Token
The Bounders of the Shire are looking to reinforce their borders!  Donate any found Bounder's Tokens to help in their aid.
Thank you, [placeholder]!  It takes many single drops to fill a bucket, but each one is appreciated!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will consume 1 Bounder's Token.</rgb>

'Thank you, [placeholder]!  It takes many drops to fill a bucket, but each one is appreciated!  Your help will save countless lives.  Come back when you have more to give!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will consume fifty Bounder's Tokens.</rgb>
Bring fifty tokens to Meg Proudfoot in Michel Delving
